wikipedia_page.main: Derek James Statham (born 24 March 1959) is an English former footballer who played at defensive left-back. He played for West Bromwich Albion, Southampton, Walsall and Stoke City.Statham won three international caps for England in 1983 under the management of Bobby Robson.
